title: The Echo Protocol
outcome: A cryptic Halden audio message appears citywide, warning of disaster from unchecked divergence. Multiple backup BCI subsystems reactivate, creating system chaos as regions enforce conflicting rules. Engineers, Council members, and citizen groups must work together to decode Halden’s intent, halt feedback loops, and forge an uneasy peace. Past Council power struggles and Halden’s secret authority reframe his death as a last attempt to guide Stenograd through its most dangerous test.

events.description: An audio file in Halden's voice broadcasts citywide, cryptically warning of BCI 'irreversible divergence.' Analog and digital systems briefly synchronize before reverting to distinct local rules.
System engineers discover old BCI backup nodes activating unattended, each enforcing conflicting behavioral mandates and causing transport and access chaos at district borders.
Emergency meetings are called as daily life halts at district boundaries. Residents face denied access, duplicated penalties, and rapid BCI score fluctuation.

A coalition of systems experts, Council members, and citizen assemblies work to decode Halden’s message and resolve the feedback loops. A citywide vote is considered for the first time since the BCI's creation.

Stenograd restores partial BCI integration using Halden’s final logic, balancing local autonomy with citywide stability. Halden’s death is recast as a calculated warning from a leader facing an impossible choice.
